price: wọn yó sì sọ fún wọn pé: “Níbo ni n̄ǹkan tí ẹ̀ ń jọ́sìn fún wà?”
arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum taʿbudūna
